name: OddsGame,CanYouGuessTheNumber
0:
”Alexa, open the odds game”
”Alexa, start a hard mode game”
”Alexa, what's my hard mode score”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the odds game
des:
When you start a game, Alexa will pick a number, you will have to guess it. You may get some clues depending on the game mode, can you guess the number?
Ask Alexa for your score in any game mode to see how you are doing! 
Global Leaderboards will be coming soon!

For all game modes Alexa will tell you if you need to guess a higher or lower number.

Easy Mode:
0 - 10
Easy mode, you have 3 tries to guess the number! No clues here.

Normal Mode:
0 - 100
You have 5 tries to guess the number! Harder then Easy Mode, but still no clues!

Hard Mode:
0 - 1000
You have 10 tries to guess the number! You get one clue! Can You Guess The Number?

Impossible Mode:
Welcome to the One In A Million Club, but only after you beat Hard Mode! You might get some help, or not!

Contact info: skill@notimenow.com
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
